short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: **Take your Gladiatus gameplay to the next level with Gladbot by FociiCreations!**

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Gladiatus - GladBot v3.3.0 Reloaded
Your Ultimate Gladiatus Companion Bot

Try 3-Day trial !
Lots of new updates!

Join Our Community: https://discord.gg/dKCTFFnkjZ

*Big Update*

-> For any unusual behavior, please use the 'RESET BOT' option and report on Discord.
-> Please read terms and conditions before using.

English:

With GladBot, players can focus on enjoying the game while the bot takes care of the tedious tasks. GladBot does not hack or exploit the game in any way, it simply automates the tasks that the user would normally do manually. You can also open a second tab to explore the game freely while the bot is running. 

How to get trial : Click on 'Gladbot License' button and click 'Get a Trial Key' then copy the key to submit.

For questions, patch notes, bug fixes, issues, and feedback, please use our Discord channel.

https://discord.gg/dKCTFFnkjZ

Turkce:

GladBot ile oyunun tadını çıkarın, sıkıcı işleri o bize bırakın. GladBot hile yapmaz veya oyunu suistimal etmez, yalnızca sizin manuel olarak yapacağınız görevleri otomatik hale getirir. Bot çalışırken oyunu özgürce keşfetmek için ikinci bir sekme bile açabilirsiniz, bu sekilde bot calisirken sorun yasamazsiniz.

Trial Nasil Alinir : Trial almak icin 'Gladbot License' butonuna basin sonrasinda 'Get a Trial Key' butonuna basin. Cikan anahtar kodunu kopyalayip submit e basin.

Sorulariniz, sorunlariniz, patch notlari ve bug duzeltmelerini gormek icin discord kanalimiza katilin. Desteginiz icin tesekkurler.

https://discord.gg/dKCTFFnkjZ
